title: Magnificent 7 Earnings Results Solidify Market Leadership
text: Given their enormous earnings power and growth profiles, it is hard to argue with the group's market leadership. Of the bunch, only NVIDIA remains to report.

title: Tech's longtime highfliers are growing up by getting smaller
text: Wall Street is rewarding tech companies like Meta and Amazon for showing financial discipline and maturation.

title: Bezos plans on selling 50 million Amazon shares during next 12 months
text: Jeff Bezos may offload a large amount of Amazon shares in the next year, a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission indicated.

title: Big Tech Crushes Earnings: Which One Should You Buy?
text: We saw a slew of earnings this week from the market's leading stocks, and they didn't disappoint. In addition to many other companies that reported earnings, five of the ‘Magnificent 7' informed us of their performance.

title: Amazon warns climate change could disrupt its business in annual filing
text: Amazon is telling investors that the climate crisis could start having a material impact on its business.

title: Why Are Stocks Up Today?
text: The stock market is on track to notch new highs this week as stocks look to close well in the green Friday. So why are stocks up today?

title: Jeff Bezos to sell 50 mln shares of Amazon by Jan.31 next year - filing
text: Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos will sell 50 million shares in the online retail and cloud services firm over the next one year, according to a company filing on Friday.

title: Jeff Bezos Filed Plan to Sell Up to $8.6 Billion of Amazon Stock
text: Retail and cloud firm Amazon disclosed that founder Jeff Bezos adopted a plan to sell up to 50 million shares through January 2025.

title: Amazon on track to be worth more than Alphabet for the first time in 16 months
text: Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +7.69% is poised to overtake Alphabet Inc. GOOG, +0.52% GOOGL, +0.57% and become the third-largest U.S. public company upon Friday's close, after its results were well received by Wall Street and Alphabet's earlier in the week got panned. The race is tight, however, with Amazon recently having a $1.78 trillion valuation based on intraday action and Alphabet having a $1.77 trillion market capitalization.

title: Amazon's (AMZN) Q4 Earnings & Sales Beat Estimates, Up Y/Y
text: Amazon's (AMZN) fourth-quarter results benefit from robust performance during the holiday shopping season. Strength in AWS, Prime, third-party sellers and advertising businesses was a plus.

title: Snowflake, Datadog, Cloud Software Stocks Lifted By Amazon, Microsoft Reports
text: Snowflake stock led as enterprise software firms jumped higher following strong cloud results from Amazon and Microsoft.

title: ETFs to Tap on Amazon's Strong Q4 Earnings
text: Amazon had a record-breaking holiday shopping season and closed out a robust 2023. It provided optimistic guidance for the first quarter of 2024.

title: Why Amazon Stock Was Surging Today
text: Amazon beat estimates on the top and bottom lines. Profits surged, driven by cost cuts and growth in higher-margin businesses.

title: Amazon Stock Hits 2-Year Highs After Earnings
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) stock is gapping to two-year highs today, after the Big Tech giant's strong fourth-quarter results.

title: Tech Mania: Meta Stock Has Best Day In A Decade As Amazon Shares Hit 2-Year High
text: Shares of Meta and Amazon skyrocketed Friday to multiyear highs after the technology giants each reported blowout earnings, capping the firms' dramatic recoveries from their 2022 nadirs as some of their big tech stock peers have been relegated to the sidelines.

title: Amazon stock on the verge of a 40% rally
text: A 7% jump in Friday's pre-market session should tell you everything you need about Amazon.com Inc. NASDAQ: AMZN Q4 results. The e-commerce giant released them after the bell rang to end Thursday's session in one of the most eagerly anticipated reports of the earnings season so far.

title: Dow Jones Today: Nasdaq Futures Soar on Meta, Amazon Earnings; Jobs Report Weighs on Dow
text: Stock futures were up in premarket trading Friday as Meta and Amazon shares soared after the two blew past analysts' expectations with their quarterly earnings reports.

title: Amazon Stock Jumps On Earnings Beat, Cloud AI Product Growth—Key Price Levels to Watch
text: Amazon (AMZN) shares gained more than 7% in premarket trading Friday after the e-commerce giant late Thursday released a blowout quarterly earnings report fueled by growth in its retail business and increasing demand for the cloud division's artificial intelligence products.

title: Amazon Says Video And Music Spending Rose 14% In 2023
text: Amazon said its spending on video and music content grew 14% in 2023, reaching $18.9 billion. The figure, disclosed Friday morning in the company's annual report filed with the SEC, includes licensing and production costs for Prime member offerings as well as costs for digital subscriptions and sold or rented titles.

title: Why Meta Stock Tops Amazon's As A 2024 Generative AI Play
text: What's bigger: the Amazon AMZN or infinity — the logo of Meta Platforms?

title: The 3 Best Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Invest In for Big Gains in 2024
text: The rapid emergence of artificial intelligence has confounded both skeptics and believers. The shift from obscurity in 2021 to widespread adoption and investment has been unprecedented.

title: AI predicts Amazon stock price at end of 2024
text: The e-commerce giant with fingers in multiple very lucrative pies, including streaming, gaming, audiobooks, and cloud infrastructure, Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) recently published a particularly strong earnings report for the fourth quarter of 2023.

title: Amazon says the ‘magic words.' They could spur a $100 billion market-cap boost.
text: Three months back, Amazon.com Inc. executives sent investors scrambling for their dictionaries as they called out “attenuating” — or lessening —pressures on the AWS cloud-computing business.

title: Is it a bubble? Magnificent 7 market cap equals the GDP of 11 major cities
text: At $12.5 trillion — and likely a whole lot more after Friday — the combined market cap of Microsoft MSFT, +1.56%, Apple AAPL, +1.33%, Alphabet GOOGL, +0.76%, Amazon.com AMZN, +2.63%, Nvidia NVDA, +2.44% and Tesla TSLA, +0.84% is equal to the combined GDP of New, York, Tokyo, London, Los Angeles, Paris, Seoul, Chicago, San Francisco, Osaka, Dallas and Shanghai, according to Bank of America calculations.

title: Amazon Stock Pops 7% as Earnings Sprint by Expectations on Strong Holiday Shopping Season
text: Fourth-quarter 2023 revenue grew 14% year over year, beating the 11% Wall Street consensus estimate. The quarter's earnings per share soared 3,233%, racing by the 2,567% growth analysts had projected.

title: Nasdaq to leap as Meta and Amazon fly ahead of jobs report
text: 7:00am: Nasdaq to leap as Meta and Amazon fly; Exxon and Chevron up after earnings  The Nasdaq is set to open sharply higher after gains in Meta and Amazon after the market close although the mood could be soured depending on the US jobs report. In pre-market trading, futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were up 0.1%, while those for the S&P 500 rose 0.5% and contracts for the Nasdaq 100 futures climbed 1.0%.

title: Amazon Pharmacy Fights For Recognition
text: New York City residents received an important e-mail this week that told them “Your New Pharmacy is Amazon AMZN Pharmacy.” The bold ad promised to save customers both money and time since customers no longer had to make a trip to the local pharmacy.

title: The best trades of the last 50 years show what investors should do now
text: Early Friday futures trading shows stock indices on the front foot. Whether they hold that optimism into Wall Street's opening bell may depend on labor market data.

title: Amazon soars as AI, retail strength power revenue growth
text: Amazon.com shares jumped 6% before the bell on Friday after the e-commerce heavyweight reported higher-than-expected holiday-quarter sales and profited from its fast-growing AI-powered cloud business.

title: Amazon Stock Soars as Analysts Rush to Raise Price Targets. Where Shares Could Go.
text: Twenty analysts surveyed by FactSet raise their price targets on Amazon stock after the company's earnings.

title: When You Look Back in 5 Years, You'll Wish You'd Bought This Trillion-Dollar Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock
text: Microsoft has become one of the world's leading artificial intelligence (AI) companies, thanks in part to its $10 billion investment in OpenAI. Microsoft just reported its financial results for the fiscal 2024 second quarter, and AI made powerful contributions to the company's growth.

title: Amazon and Meta---Nothing Artificial About These Results
text: Strong earnings growth and a surprise dividend draw cheers as Apple reveals its China struggles, but AI hopes are high.
